message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly skewed, split.  I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to be generous. I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a good deal.
I rejected your offer because it wasn't fair.  Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 60% and you can have 40%.
Meet me in the middle, but with a slight twist. I'll give you the same as me, but I'll get the chance to make the next offer if you reject this one.
